item.title: Trump formally appeals his New York hush money conviction

item.title: Hurricane Melissa live updates: 'Catastrophic' storm set to make landfall in Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa, now a powerful Category 5 storm, is set to be Jamaica's worst storm in history.

item.title: WATCH: Lobby of luxury Florida hotel flooded amid storms
item.description: Experts said the storm unleased rains comparable to what the region saw from a hurricane in 2022.

item.title: WATCH: Japanese PM gifts Trump late Shinzo Abe's putter
item.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi gifted President Trump the putter of late Japanese prime minister Shinzo Abe during his visit to Tokyo.
